name: Spicy Tequila-Lime Tomato Soup
author: cloe
summary: Simple, inexpensive, and hearty. My boyfriend and I love this different take on boring tomato soup. Best of all, it is very low in calories. Add shrimp for a protein boost.
ingredients: 1  green bell pepper, seeded and cut into chunks
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Heat olive oil in a large stockpot over medium heat; cook and stir onion, celery, and garlic until softened, 5 to 10 minutes
Add green bell pepper and jalapeno peppers to onion mixture; cook and stir until peppers are softened, about 5 minutes
Pour tequila into vegetable mixture and simmer until slightly reduced, 3 to 4 minutes
Add fired-roasted tomatoes, vegetable stock, crushed tomatoes, lime juice, salt, and pepper to vegetable-tequila mixture; bring to a boil
Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until flavors have blended, about 20 minutes
Stir cilantro into soup just before serving
